name: Shrimp alla Vodka
description: Here’s our take on Gigi Hadid’s famous Spicy Vodka Pasta. We’ve turned down the heat for you for a kid-friendly dish, but check out the Tip if you don’t mind a little bite. Choose any size shrimp you want—fresh or frozen works. We’re all about those jumbo ones: they’re succulent and fork-friendly. Or, swap shrimp for your favourite seafood, like clams or mussels.

ingredients.name: uncooked, jumbo peeled shrimp (defrosted, if frozen)
Lemon Dilly or Herb & Garlic Dip Mix
Rosée Sauce Mix or Alfredo Sauce Mix

preparation: In a large saucepan, cook pasta according to package instructions.

Season shrimp with salt and pepper, and dip mix, if using. Heat oil in Sauté Pan over medium-high heat. When hot, add shrimp; stir-fry until cooked through, 2–3 min. Place in a bowl; cover to keep warm.

Don’t wash sauté pan. Add milk; stir in sauce mix, tomato paste, and vodka, if using. Bring to a simmer over medium heat, stirring constantly. Reduce heat to low; simmer gently for 3 min, or until very thick.
Return noodles to pasta pot; add shrimp and sauce. Stir noodles, shrimp, and sauce until everything is evenly coated.
Spoon into bowls; add toppings, if desired.
tips: Like it spicy? Stir in 1–1 1⁄2 tsp Poco Picante Salsa Mix or chili flakes along with Rosée Sauce Mix.
Reserve some pasta water when draining the pasta. If your sauce is too thick, gradually stir in the reserved pasta water, 1⁄4 cup at a time, to thin it out.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 2 cups leafy greens and 1 tbsp Epicure Dressing.

products.name: Lemon Dilly Dip Mix
summary: Beyond being one of our most-loved kid-friendly dips – they love it for dunking chicken strips, fish bites, and veggies – Lemon Dilly is all about versatility. With loads of dill and a hint of lemon zest, it makes an utterly delicious tzatziki and spread for burgers and sandwiches, and levels up everything from salad dressing and salmon to pasta and vegetables.

products.name: Herb & Garlic Dip Mix
summary: Classic notes of chives, onion & garlic.

products.name: Rosée Sauce Mix (Pack of 3)
summary: Tired of the same old pasta? It’s time to take it to the next level with something a little fancy but oh-so-easy to make: Rosée Sauce. Creamy with a rich tomato flavor, this thick sauce is very family-friendly and easily clings to your favorite noodles. Make it with two simple ingredients, milk and tomato paste, in just five minutes in the microwave!

products.name: Alfredo Sauce Mix (Pack of 3)
summary: Luxurious, creamy sauce for pasta, seafood, fish, and chicken.

products.name: Sauté Pan
summary: An all-purpose pan to brown, sauté, and simmer—ideal for one pan meals.

products.name: Poco Picante Salsa Mix
summary: The vibrant flavours of cayenne, chilies, and garlic come together to create a zesty salsa with a medium kick.
